SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreFormsFields] ( [CoreFormsFields_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreForms_Ky] int NULL , [CoreFormsFieldset_Ky] int NULL , [CoreFormsTabs_Ky] int NULL , [CoreAttributes_Ky] int NULL , [CoreFormsFields_Order] int NULL , [CoreFormsFields_Label] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreFormsFields_Columns] tinyint NULL , [CoreFormsFields_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreFormsFields_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreFormsFields_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreFormsFields_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreFormsFields_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreFormsFields_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [CoreFormsFields_Hidden] bit NULL , [CoreFormsFields_Readonly] bit NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreFormsFields] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreFormsFields PRIMARY KEY ([CoreFormsFields_Ky])
